channel.title: Possible real joining for clan chats?

item.title: Possible real joining for clan chats?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

Alright I want to make it so when someone clicks join chat an interface pops up to enter the players name instead of what I have now which is command based like ::ccjoin playername. I think I may have a good start when I found these for friends and ignore adding and messaging, could someone help me with this? Here’s what I think I could possibly base it off of…

[code] case 126:
// pm message
long friendtosend = inStream.readQWord();
byte pmchatText[] = new byte[100];
int pmchatTextSize = (byte) (packetSize - 8);

		inStream.readBytes(pmchatText, pmchatTextSize, 0);[/code]

All help appreciated…
Thanks, Moose

Read full topic
item.source: Possible real joining for clan chats?
